existing_features.title: Implement an opening splash overlay that displays the existing BidArena logo centered on the screen when the site first loads, animates the logo with a quick “pop” (scale up) and then fades the splash out, revealing the main page content only after the splash completes.
Add Tailwind/CSS animation utilities (keyframes/classes) required for the splash “pop” and “fade out” effects and ensure they don’t conflict with existing fade-in animations used in the hero section.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add opening splash animation: show logo on page load, then fade it out to reveal the page content
